attributes.action: Increase incapacity Benifit To £200 Per Week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE COST OF LIVING HAS OVERTAKEN THE BENIFIT RECEIVED. THE PRICE INCREASE OF BASIC GOODS SUCH AS GAS-ELECTRICITY-WATER-FOOD-OIL-PETROL-PUBLIC TRANSPORT-TRANSPORTATION OF GOODS ECT.ECT.AS USUAL STATE BENIFIT RECIPIANTS ARE LEFT STRUGGELING TO MAKE ENDS MEET!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
